name: JAS shoot 2d shoot and physics
description:
Engage in epic slow_mo moments and crazy smash through windows scenes while taking down enemy after enemy. Shooting the gas tanks is just overkill you know !! But insanely cool. Have fun exploding the enemys into  body parts explosions in half realistic half fantastical physics .Its just awesome !!!!

what more are you waiting for.....Download the game Freakin' Now...

XOXO <3
